cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on April 6, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7277, Improving Oversight of Veterans Community Care Providers Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 55 (Tuesday, March 29, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PAPPAS:
H.R. 7277.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution states that ``Congress shall have the authority
to make all Laws which shall be necessary and proper for
carrying into Execution the foregoing Powers, and all other
Powers vested by the Constitution in the Government of the
United States, or in any Department or Officer thereof.''
[Page H3971]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: Improving Oversight of the Veterans Community Care Providers Act of 2022
